api_to_notification.label: API to Notification
api_to_notification.desc: Fetch data from an API endpoint and send results to Slack, Discord, or Telegram

api_url.label: API URL
api_url.desc: The API endpoint to fetch data from

api_headers.label: API Headers
api_headers.desc: Headers to send with the API request

webhook_url.label: Notification Webhook URL
webhook_url.desc: Slack, Discord, or Telegram webhook URL

github_daily_digest.label: GitHub Daily Digest
github_daily_digest.desc: Fetch GitHub repository updates and send a daily digest to Slack or Discord

github_token.label: GitHub Token
github_token.desc: GitHub personal access token (optional for public repos)

json_transform_notify.label: JSON Transform and Notify
json_transform_notify.desc: Transform JSON data using JMESPath and send notification with results

webhook_url.label: Notification Webhook URL
webhook_url.desc: Slack webhook URL to send results

csv_to_json.label: CSV to JSON
csv_to_json.desc: Read a CSV file and convert it to JSON format

input_file.label: Input CSV File
input_file.desc: Path to the CSV file to read

output_file.label: Output JSON File
output_file.desc: Path to save the JSON output (optional)

has_header.label: Has Header Row
has_header.desc: Whether the CSV has a header row

indent.label: JSON Indent
indent.desc: Number of spaces for JSON indentation

scheduled_report.label: Scheduled Report
scheduled_report.desc: Generate a report from data and send it via email or Slack

report_content.label: Report Content
report_content.desc: The report content (plain text or markdown)

smtp_server.label: SMTP Server
smtp_server.desc: Email SMTP server (leave empty to skip email)

multi_channel_alert.label: Multi-Channel Alert
multi_channel_alert.desc: Send alert notifications to multiple channels (Slack, Discord, Telegram) simultaneously

telegram_token.label: Telegram Bot Token
telegram_token.desc: Telegram bot token (leave empty to skip)

telegram_chat_id.label: Telegram Chat ID
telegram_chat_id.desc: Telegram chat ID or channel username

screenshot_and_save.label: Screenshot and Save
screenshot_and_save.desc: Take a screenshot of a webpage and save it to a file

output_path.label: Output Path
output_path.desc: File path to save the screenshot

wait_selector.label: Wait Selector
wait_selector.desc: CSS selector to wait for before screenshot

full_page.label: Full Page
full_page.desc: Capture the full page (not just viewport)

scrape_to_json.label: Scrape Web to JSON
scrape_to_json.desc: Scrape a webpage and extract data into structured JSON format

wait_selector.label: Wait Selector
wait_selector.desc: CSS selector to wait for before scraping

search_and_notify.label: Web Search and Notify
search_and_notify.desc: Search the web using Google and send results to Slack, Discord, or Telegram

query.label: Search Query
query.desc: The search term to look up

webhook_url.label: Notification Webhook URL
webhook_url.desc: Slack, Discord, or Telegram webhook URL

max_results.label: Max Results
max_results.desc: Maximum number of results to return

cli.description: A powerful automation engine for web scraping and workflow orchestration
cli.create_workflow_prompt: Would you like to create an example workflow?
cli.goodbye: Thank you for using Workflow Engine!

menu.title: Main Menu
menu.run_workflow_desc: Execute a workflow from file or selection
menu.not_implemented: This feature is not yet implemented
menu.goodbye: Goodbye! Thank you for using Flyto.

help.title: Help
help.usage_content: Select 'Run Workflow' to execute automation tasks
help.workflows_content: YAML files that define automation sequences
help.params_content: Pass values using --param key=value or interactively

execution.concurrent_safe_description: Whether it can run in parallel

security.required_permissions_description: Permissions needed to execute this module

warnings.credential_required: This module requires API credentials to run
warnings.sensitive_data_warning: This module handles sensitive information. Output may be masked in logs
warnings.concurrent_unsafe: This module is not suitable for parallel execution. Remove from parallel block
warnings.retry_on_failure: Will automatically retry up to {max} times on failure with exponential backoff
